original_text: And every beast that parteth the hoof, and cleaveth the cleft into two claws, and cheweth the cud among the beasts, that ye shall eat.
korean_text: 짐승 중에 굽이 갈라져 쪽발도 되고 새김질도 하는 모든 것은 너희가 먹을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And every beast that parteth the hoof
and cleaveth the cleft into two claws
and cheweth the cud among the beasts
